evidence.claim: Atom Limbs utilizes AWS cloud services for their infrastructure needs.
The company follows FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Utilization of HL7 protocols is mentioned in the context of interoperability.
The integration patterns include REST API communications with external EHR systems.
Atom Limbs is committed to HIPAA compliance in managing sensitive health data.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant X12 or EDI-related use cases found on the website.
